modules.description: This module implements TLS protocol operations over a Mirage flow, providing functions to read and write encrypted data, manage connection lifecycle with shutdown and close, and perform session renegotiation and key updates. It handles TLS client and server handshake initiation over an existing flow, returning a secured flow for subsequent communication. Use cases include securing network connections for HTTPS servers or clients, implementing secure MQTT brokers, or wrapping DNS-over-TLS transports.

Handles X.509 certificate operations using a key-value store and clock. Provides functions to create an authenticator with optional hash restrictions and CRLs, and to load certificate chains and private keys. Used for configuring TLS endpoints with certificate-based authentication in MirageOS applications.

Implements TLS protocol operations over Mirage flows, including handshake initiation, encrypted read/write, session renegotiation, and connection lifecycle management. Works with X.509 certificates and private keys via the X509 submodule for certificate-based authentication. Used to secure network services like HTTPS servers, MQTT brokers, and DNS-over-TLS transports in MirageOS applications.
